name: Telegration
overview: Telegration reduces costs and improves efficiencies for over 30,000 small, medium and enterprise businesses, including Fortune 500 corporations, cities, government agencies, and other organizations while providing maximum flexibility, service guarantees and exceptional customer service. In addition to being one of the largest AT&T Authorized Solution Providers of Mobility, local, long distance, data and Internet nationwide, Telegration also offers a complete range of local, long distance, and Internet services from a growing number of leading providers, such as AT&T, XO Communications, US Signal, Level3, Qwest, TDS Metrocom, Global Crossing, Cavalier, TNCI, CBeyond, Paetec, 123.net, New Edge Networks, TelNet Worldwide, Masergy, Grid 4, Time Warner Cable, First Communications, Nitel, One Communications, Buckeye Telesystem, ACD.Net, and others. Telegration also provides its own private-branded long distance services for voice, video and data applications using the Verizon and TNCI networks. In addition, Telegration provides wholesale priced web and audio conference calling for anywhere, anytime service for their customers to increase their telecommunications efficiency.
